desc: Brave LLC was built from a desire to help women feel comfortable in their clothing, shoes and accessories. ALL WOMEN should feel comfort and happiness when looking in the mirror. At Brave we want to help you find your "FIT" and realize your true beautiful comfort zone! You are worth it. Be brave.

layout.text: Come see us in Historic Downtown Barre, Vermont
We believe happiness and comfort are what is important. You can have both!
